modName: Revealing Ebony Mail for Sundracon and Favored Soul Males
summary: Less bulky version of ebony mail, with subtly transparent leggings and gauntlets. Replaces existing ebony mail armor for males. I\'ve only tested it with human males.
descriptionHtml:
To install, copy the contents of the \"meshes\" and \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim data folder.

I never could get the scripts to import NIF files into Blender successfully, so this set of armor is built largely with duct-tape and Nifskope. Mostly Nifskope.

I took several copies of the base armor and changed the UV mapping on each copy so that only a section was visible, then I morphed the armor shape so the visible section fit more snugly. This means that there are a lot of extra polygons that aren\'t getting rendered, and so it might put a drag on your system performance (I didn\'t see any -- I have a 6 year old computer with a brand new mid-grade video card). On the plus side, it makes the armor very modular and easily tweakable in Nifskope.

Requires:
Sundracon Male: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Update: Now with a Favored Soul version, which unfortunately does not come with leggings and armbands. Requires Favored Soul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
author: Seedye
